items.why_not_deterministic: User intent must be translated to actionable step text
Completion criteria may be implicit in user request
Context may indicate step is no longer relevant

disallowed_shortcuts: Do not infer steps not explicitly requested by user
Do not auto-complete steps without verification
Do not reorder steps without explicit consent

Do not modify step descriptions after creation without consent

reasoning_trace: Judgment is limited to intent translation and completion verification. All structural mutations require explicit user direction. Skip requires consent to prevent silent plan corruption.
